parse.title: List of fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Central America

text.*:
This page lists the fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Central America.

Contents

  • 1 Belize
  • 2 El Salvador
  • 3 Guatemala
  • 4 Honduras
  • 5 Nicaragua
  • 6 Costa Rica
  • 7 Panama
  • 8 See also
  • 9 References

Belize[edit]

Fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Belize
Ambergris Cay Limestone
Group Formation Period Notes
Ambergris Cay Limestone Late Pleistocene [1]

El Salvador[edit]

Fossiliferous stratigraphic units in El Salvador
Cuscatlán Formation
Group Formation Period Notes
Cuscatlán Formation Blancan-Irvingtonian [2]

Guatemala[edit]

Fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Guatemala
Herreria Formation
Campur Formation
Ixcoy Formation
Chocal Formation
Group Formation Period Notes
Herreria Formation Miocene [3]
Campur Formation Turonian-Maastrichtian [4]
Ixcoy Formation Aptian-Maastrichtian [5]
Santa Rosa Group Chocal Formation Artinskian-Kungurian [6]

Honduras[edit]

Fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Honduras
Gracias Formation
Esquias Formation
Cantarranas Formation
Agua Fría Formation
El Plan Formation
Group Formation Period Notes
Gracias Formation Miocene [7]
Valle de Angelis Group Esquias Formation Late Albian-Early Turonian [8]
Cantarranas Formation Valanginian [9]
Agua Fría Formation Bathonian [10]
El Plan Formation Late Triassic [11]

Nicaragua[edit]

Fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Nicaragua
Las Sierras Formation
El Salto Formation
Brito Formation
Group Formation Period Notes
Las Sierras Formation Pleistocene [12]
El Salto Formation Early Pliocene [13]
Brito Formation Late Eocene [14]
